text:
The chicken chop
from the Western shop is excellent. Comes with good selection of sides. Price is very reasonable.

Dimsum was priced at $1.50 per item. Had the har kow  n porridge. It was very good especially at this price point.

Briyani was also delicious
Rice was fragrant n tasty. Mutton was soft.
Mee Goreng was delicious
It was dry and  well seasoned,
I dislike it wet n sloppy noodles .
Will definitely be back to try more.

The tim sum taste terrible. The steamed rice roll w char xiu taste weird like the char xiu gone bad. The steamed siew mai also taste unfresh.  The western food fries is cold n soggy. The Indian prata curry taste terrible. Worst is the mutton soup totally tasteless. Unbelievable.

A newly revamped coffeeshop around the neighbourhood after about a month of renovation. It’s a joint venture with Kimly and 206 holding.

There is a refreshed in their selection of stores here and quite a number of positioned itself as 24 hours store. One of them is Kimly Dim Sum store, selling its Dimsum for $1.50 per long and it’s highly hyped as it’s affordable.

Lui San Jie Mee Hoon Kueh is also one of the high traffic stores where they offer delicious MHK and fried KacheongGai.

Nonetheless, Poh Kee Chicken rice store is the OG store here. They offered succulent chicken meat and I must say this is one of the better chicken rice stores around Toa Payoh!

I’ve been a regular customer since your grand opening and have always appreciated the quality of your food and drinks. However, I had a truly horrifying experience today that I feel must be brought to your attention.

After taking a few sips from my Ice Milo, I was shocked and disgusted to discover a bug or insect inside the drink. This is extremely concerning from a hygiene and safety perspective.

I hope this incident is taken seriously and that appropriate steps are taken to investigate how this happened and to ensure it doesn’t occur again—for the safety of all customers.

I would appreciate a response regarding this matter and how you intend to address it.

$ 7.30 for MFG with 南乳炸肉 which is quite attractive price, but if you only go for MFG only which cost $6 which is consider quite expensive. MFG soso only, very thick, small portion and you need to request for the soup
